title: PRODUCT AND BRAND MANAGEMENT
description: The conversion of technology into new products requires an understanding of how to develop a meaningful value proposition and integrate the development of a product with a marketing strategy that creates brand equity.  This course will focus on the management of products, the implications of other marketing decisions on product and brand management, the management of product lines within the organization, including introduction, growth, and market exit.  (Prerequisite: MKT 500 or equivalent content, or consent of instructor.)
